TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(object sender, StructureChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed StructureChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub StructureChangedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As StructureChangedEventArgs)
public delegate void StructureChangedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, StructureChangedEventArgs ^ e);
type StructureChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * StructureChangedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.summary: 代表由用戶端應用程式實作的方法，以處理當使用者介面自動化樹狀目錄變更時所引發的事件。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表描述的資訊，針對不同的結構變更委派所接收的事件。
|`e.structureChangeType`|`sender`|`e.runtimeId`| |-----------------------------|--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildAdded>|已新增的子系。|已新增的子系。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildRemoved>|已移除的子系的父系。|已移除的子系。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkAdded>|已新增的子系的父系。|已新增的子系的父系。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenBulkRemoved>|已移除的子系的父系。|已移除的子系的父系。| |<xref:System.Windows.Automation.StructureChangeType.ChildrenInvalidated>|判定為無效的子系的父系。|判定為無效的子系的父代|

Docs.related: 訂閱 UI 自動化事件
